text: @NYGovCuomo ALERT!!! 90% #COVID19 reduction by HCQ! Check: https://t.co/S32Li5GrGJ. ONLY 20 of 65,000 of Lupus patients in Italy developed #COVID19 = 0.03%, compared to average infection rate in Italy as 0.3%=3,333/1M per https://t.co/r6nQcLOUPM. 0 died, 0 is in ICU. Will #CNN report it?
